attributes.additional_details:
Quote  [Dave]
 " 'You will have a referendum on the E.U.'


'I will INCREASE the number of NHS nurses' ".......................................................................






As the Parties seem unable to keep the promises they make on the run up to an election,... We, the People, believe it is time to ask, that it becomes legally binding,  any promises/pledges made by the elected Party are enacted within one term of office....
